creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: two women in kimono with umbrellas walking through flooded street (or pond?) at L; in background is a small hill with large, blossoming tree with supports and lattice; silhouettes of trees in far back
marks: left, cursive jizuri: 自摺　昭和拾年作　櫻八題　春雨 {jizuri, Shō LRC: よし田 {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Spring Rain
